msContents.summary: The text is about erotics and it seems that the text is rare. Front folio has lines written in granth script but are not legible due to brown patches on the folio. The partial trascription of the text is : line 1 koyambutturaṃ nāmataḥ purasya (gap of 4 letters due to sticker) ge vidyamānacāma(1 illegible charactor) bā (gryabhāra?) vāsīnā line 2 nārāyaṇanāmadheyena so (gap of 4 letters due to sticker) veṃkaṭeśabudhāyedaṃ madhuranapuravāsīne line 3 kāmaśāstramu? dādattaṃ jī (gap of 2-3 letters due to sticker) candratārakaṃ . śrī gaṇapati jayati ..

msItem.title: Madanānandasāra
msItem.incipit: 1v 1 sarvānandanidānaṃ śivayostad cet astu modāya yaddṛṣṭvānossāraṃ saṃsāraṃ ma 1v 2 te narāssaraṃ .. namo madanāya ratipriyāya ratikāntaṃ namas l̥nya jagadālhādahetave . śrīmanmādhavanā 1v 3 thāya namaḥ . narendreṇedamucyate . ……………….

TEI.text:
1v 1 śrīmahāgaṇapataye namaḥ sarvānandanidānaṃ śivayostad cet astu modāya yaddṛṣṭvānossāraṃ saṃsāraṃ ma 1v 2 te narāssaraṃ .. namo madanāya ratipriyāya ratikāntaṃ namas l̥nya jagadālhādahetave . śrīmanmādhavanā 1v 3 thāya namaḥ . narendreṇedamucyate . ……………….
1v 7 dṛṣṭvā kaṣṭāñca cittabhavaceṣṭāṃ racitomadanānandassārānāhṛtya yat śāstrāṇāṃ 1v 8 tatra tāvat strīpuruṣalakṣaṇamāha … 14v 10 ṇḍurau .. romaśau caraṇau yaya sa bhavedduḥkhajīvitaḥ ..
